alert.note: Alert for Garden (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garden County through 845 PM MDT... At 828 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Alliance Airport, or 21 miles south of Alliance, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Richardson Lake, Mumper and Tralnor Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
